content.detailedDescription: I was outside my home last night on the porch enjoying the beutiful night air.I looked to my left to look at more stars when i seen this light in the sky moveing,there was no sound but it was moveing all around.The light engulfing it was white and pulsating.I ran in the house to get my video camera to record it and when i came back out it had moved but i was still able to capture about a minutes worth.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Cool light show

content.detailedDescription:
June 15, 2012 ��� observation location is about 16 miles south of san antonio, texas on highway 16 south. we did not have a gps available but the latitude and longitude is close to this: 29.191807,-98.583584. 

this observation started at 9:45 pm central time and lasted until 12:05 am. we used night vision goggles (nvgs) and meade instruments refractor telescope. we are facing south and looking almost straight up to saturn at 75 to 80 degrees from ground level.

you will need to start looking at the lower left side of saturn as it is in the night sky at 9:45 pm. the object comes active just after a commercial airliner passes from the north and flies south towards laredo, texas though the southern corridor.

i have not been able to see the object before 9:45 pm but what you are looking for is a small flash of light. under unaided eyesight, the small flash of light is about two to four times the size of saturn. with the nvg, you can see it clear and see the object flash out into space as well as flash towards earth.

we have timed the intervals between flashes at 28 to 33 seconds under unaided conditions. with the telescope, we can see the object flash its light down to earth and in between the downward flash, the object flashes out into space.
  
we have verified the object is in a geosynchronous orbit directly above the san antonio���s air traffic controlled southern corridor however, at this time we have not contacted the atc nor nasa for any kind of confirmation. 

web research states if this object is a real satellite in (geo) orbit, it should be 35,786 km (22,000 miles) above us.  if it is a satellite, why does it flash a light so bright from 22,000 miles up?

anyway, if you get a chance on a clear, moonless night, look up and see something cool.
content.summary: South san antonio nightly sighting anyone can witness

content.detailedDescription:
I see these ufo's about every night mostly in the east and south .
but tonight they were nne&e and i even ask my 7yr old grandson .
too come out look at them and i pointed to them ask him did he see them.
move he said yes we looking at them with the naked eye .
i've seen them so many times i can petty much look up spot one because
satlights don't wobble airplanes have nav lights.
i don.T excited about seeing them in the night sky but if one land near me
i will walk to it knock on door when door open's it will be the first.
(ufo hijacking in history !!!)
i'm just in wrong place .
i don't lose sight of them ijust get tired of standing out there watching 
them.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: When i spotted them they were sitting there like stars then they move and return .

content.detailedDescription: I was out on my front porch haveing a smoke and enjoying the night weather when i noticed this star off to my left,blinking fast and changeing size, i rand back in the house and grabed my video camera to record this even and the thing changes possition on my but i was able to capture a little on video.I thought the whole event was rather interesting to say the least.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright light and moveing

content.detailedDescription: at approx 8:20pm myself and a coworker i was bringing home noticed an orb in the sky. thought at first it was a blimp or advertisement balloon for a car dealership. as we got closer we saw that it had three "legs" extended outward as if they were landing gear of some sort. we pulled into a parking lot and i noticed many other people standing around staring at it. my co worker entered the store and i began speaking with a woman that was also witnessing this "orb". as i spoke with her she said, "oh my god". i looked back and it was gone! she said it vanished. it didn't go up, down, east, west... it just vanished. it looked like a very large, small building size, pinball in the sky. all metallic reflecting the sky and sun.
content.summary: On way home from work witnessed hovering orb.

content.detailedDescription:
Standing out on porch smoking, with my girlfriend whom also witnessed ,
i spotted the yellow orange lighted glowing oval looking craft or object, coming down very slow, at first i thought it was stationary but noticed it was lowering, and i said honey what is that,
i am very much into aviation , and it did not take long for me to discredit it being any manned craft, it moved just a bit faster as it got close to earth, right before it came to the top of mountain it went dark then back on again then lowered behind mountain,i know it went behind mountain due to the fact i saw the light hover behind the trees at the top, for a second after hovering it dropped behind, i watched for some time and never saw it go back up, but i could not stay out all night,  while i was watching to see if it would come back up, i say another way up maybe space, at first i thought a satellite, the speed was about right but then for a moment i could barely see oranges yellow color then by surprise it cut right very sharply into another path and kept going,

i am pretty smart and try to dismiss any and all possibility first before coming to the ufo conclusion,
i would be great full talking to someone about this, because i would like to show where and see the area myself,
about a year ago we both saw another one pretty much do the same thing in h same area, only it did not have  the chance to duck behind anything, and it was not all the way dark, but it just vanished, when we were trying to figure out what it was
this was about 11:30 pm give or take a few minutes
content.summary: Glowing ball like, it came down slow from sky and right behind mountain in front of me, would like to check area out with someone, i know where the area is

content.detailedDescription:
i have always been interested in aircraft.  when i was in school and went to the library i always read janes military and other aircraft books.  even at the time of my sighting i could indentify 95+ percent of any aircraft, military or civilian.
  during summer school vacation my parents would send my younger brother and i to stay a week or two with my grandparents in wells maine.  i was approx 14 or 15 years old at the time.  their house sat 90 degrees to the road it was on.  a small dirt parking lot about 40 ft wide and 100 ft long separated their house from the neighbors. my grandparents house was a two family with a garage attached to the rear of the house. above the garage was a patio, accessible by the second floor apartment where my grandparents lived.
  behind their house was a small field, 150 feet square.  beyond the field was a row of small trees, less than 25 feet tall. beyond the trees was a water treatment facility under construction at the time.  beyond that was a large salt water marsh several hundred yards wide,a road, beach houses and then the ocean.
  many times while at play here i noticed many,many military aircraft coming and going from the north.  they were always rather low, less than 5000 ft. due to their low altitude i always assumed there must be an air force base near by.  i saw mostly c 130 cargo planes, but do recall one time seeing a b-1 swing wing bomber, again heading due south right over the house then out over the marsh.
  on night my grandmother, my brother, and i were just settling in to watch tv.  it was around 8pm, but summer time, so it was still kinda light outside.  all of a sudden my grandfather could be heard yelling "hey, come here,hey ,hey come here"  he was out on the patio above the garage. we all went out there, and when i turned to the right and looked there was a saucer shaped craft over the dirt parking lot about 20 feet off the ground. it was about 60 feet away and moving south very slowly.  it was about 15 to 18 feet long and about 3 or 4 feet thick.  it was a dark flat black color.  i could not see any rivets or panels, or doors.  the lower half was ringed with thin, almost lazer like lights. green, yellow, orange in color, with thicker "bumps" in the lines that moved back and forth.  it made no sound. 
  nobody said a word, i could feel every hair on my body standing on end.  it's height was even with my line of sight.  it just cleared the row of small trees, went out over the marsh, then out over the ocean.  due to its slow speed this took some time.  we all went into the house when it was just a dot of light in sky.
content.summary: It either was spying on loring afb, or came from loring afb

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from having dinner at my daughter & son-in-law's home.  i was on a main, well traveled country road about 1 mile from town when i noticed what, at first, appeared to be a red balloon or remote controlled object over some far off houses, although there were no people in sight outside the homes.  i slowed down to watch object.  as it headed towards me, i slowed down to watch it, trying to figure out what it was and who was operating it.  as it was coming towards me, approximately 30ft off the ground, moving slowly, hovering and turning from side to side, i pulled my car over off the road, but parallel with it, so i could watch it go across road right behind my car.  as i hung out my car window watching it go over the road above and behind my car, it seemed to hover for about 10 seconds while it turned back and forth like a periscope would on a submarine, i couldn't hear any sound at all coming from it.  the shape appeared to be almost like a hollie hobbie bonnet with a bright white bulb in it, the bonnet was red, red. as it turned, scanning back and forth, kind of watching me?, i did a u turn in the road to continue watching it.  it crossed the road and started across a field, as i pulled into the driveway of an old abandoned house to watch it, it suddenly zoomed up and out of sight so fast, that it startled me.  just before i came upon this object, my phone made the noise of shutting off, the battery was charged and the phone had not been used.
content.summary: Slow moving, red w/bright white light inside, turning side to side, hollie hobbie hat shaped, hovered over road behind my car after i pulled over then zoomed away after i did u turn to watch it, went across field, then straight up & disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside for a cigarette and noticed a very bright light move slowly and erraticly in the sky. the light was brighter than any star/planet i have seen before. it appeared to be a single constant, unwavering light, no blips or flashes.
i see lots of planes as luton airport about 20 miles north and heathrow about 20 miles south west. this was not a plane. 2 planes were visible during the sighting and i 
could clearly see the flashing lights on them.
the light was visible before the planes and made no apparent sound. have seen many helicopters and you tend to hear them, they also have flashing lights which this did not.
i enjoy watching the night sky so am familiar with planets such as venus which is sometimes visible, but this was far brighter and moving in a irregular way. stars and planets do not move this way. this thing was not static. 
the light was as bright as the moon only smaller but bigger than any star and unwavering.
i noticed the object because it was so bright and the fact it was moving made it very distinctive. i watched it for about 30 seconds before 2 planes crossed the sky. they would have seen it without a doubt.The object was visible for another couple of minutes before fading into the distance.
i was tempted to run in for camera but i only have cameraphone so it would not have picked anything up in night time conditions besides i wanted to watch this strange event.
i could not guess size or distance of the object.
content.summary: Bright constant white light. erratic flight path, 2 airoplanes seemed to pass close to object

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at my desk by the window in my office, when i leaned back into my chair, and noticed black dot in the sky. it was traveling in my direction, so i ran into the front room and grabbed my binoculars. my wife and daughters were in there at the time, and asked what i was doing. i then looked thru the binoculars out of the front room window and got a good visual on the object. this is where i swore out loud...The object was flipping over and over, tumbling horizontally??? it was black, disk shaped with a proud centre. it was very odd! we all ran out to the garden to observe it, and that is when i shot video footage on my mobile phone. the object descended then changed direction and started emitting white lights. flash, then a red glow. the object would stop flipping, then start, it even flipped back on itself whilst maintaining a flight path. this object did not act like a balloon or look like one. we all saw a it through the binoculars. we watched as it disappeared in the distance.
content.summary: I first noticed a black dot in the sky,it was only when i looked through binoculars it became more interesting!

content.detailedDescription: My husband n i were in the front yard on are swing when my husband observed the circular shaped object which appeared to be a fireball slowly moving east .I looked up and saw it as well we continued to watch the object as it went behind the neighbors trees thats when i ran in the house to get the camera . my husband stayed out sideout and continued to watch .When i returned with the camera its motion turned south wards. i snapped a picture just before it went out of view. being from albuquerque i know what a hot air balloon looks like and this was not one. we couldnt believe what we were seeing and it was like nothing we have seen before.
content.summary: Slow moving fireball looking objectmoving west to east and semi-abruptly turned south.

content.detailedDescription: Me, my mom and son were driving west on the 210 freeway. my mother was in the passenger seat and turned slightly towards me talking, when her eyes grew huge and said "what is that?". it was about 3:00pm. bright sunny day. at first i thought they were kites, then realized as a plane flew over, going into air force base, that those were a thousand times bigger.They were in a circle. 3 huge triangles pointed inwards. they were further west. they did prepared as we turned the bend at the split. this happened many years ago. my mother has passed away and my son was 10 years old, now he is 26. i have never forgotten and always look to the west to see if just maybe they might reappear.  it seemed to me to be a strange place for them to want to hover over. i never knew where to turn. i feel kind of foolish...But i saw them along with my mom and son. never leaves my mind.
content.summary: 3 hovering triangles, slightly above city

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a friend's house when i was younger (11-12 yrs old), outside playing in his yard.  he lived in a housing development at the time of the event.  

what made us notice the object was that it was night-time and a big object flew over us with red lights; it was hard to *not* notice it.

we sat there in awe as it flew across, and after it passed, ran into his house a bit scared.  we attempted to explain it to his mother, which was unsuccessful, thinking we were just fooling with her.

it was during the night, so it was kind of tough to see exactly how this object was formed.  it appeared to be triangular in shape, like a dorito chip. looking up, it had red lights on the surface underneath.  i cannot recall how many; but it was in a pattern of a triangle as well. the object did not alternate a course, or speed.  it couldn't of been more than 20-30 ft above the roof of his one story home.  i can't recall if it had a low hum, or hardly any noise at all.  it was definitely not loud at all. it was in our view for about 10 seconds, and exited our view once it went past the treeline. it wasn't going real fast, kind of just scoping the area out possibly?  

being so young, i always dismissed this as a possible government project of some sorts.  i just watched the show "ufo's over earth", which featured sightings in bucks county, pa; which is close to my county. i couldn't believe that there were collaborating stories about this triangular object.  whenever ufo's come into a conversation, i always think about this event.  until now, i have only told a few friends and my parents.  i have nothing to gain from sharing this, and realize it is not very credible having it been almost two decades old.  i just have nothing to gain for lying about it.  i hope this account helps out in someway.
content.summary: I saw a triangular shaped object w/ red lights hover over a development of houses.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my front yard letting my dogs out to do their nightly duties. and i looked up into the sky to see the stars and i thought i noticed somthing strange. so put the dogs back in the house and at that time my 14 yr old daughter came inside and told me "the lights are back." (we have seen these lights before). so we went outside to see 6-10 glowing and blinking red lights in the sky. they started off in a straight line for aprox 1 min before scattering into diffrent directions at the same time. then we continued to observe them in the sky for aprox 45 mins. their movements seemed very random and irradict. some would hover slowly then shoot off at very high speeds, changing direction with out notice. while others would move slowly and then suddenly dissappear. this started around 10:25 pm and my husband and i watched them untill a little after 11 pm when we got tired and came inside. my daughter and her friend continued to watch foe another 20-30 mins at which point they came in. when they came inside the lights were still present in the sky.
content.summary: Multiple red lights in the sky at night. went diffrent directions at diffrent times. sometimes hivering and slowing down or speeding up.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my front yard letting my dogs out to do their nightly duties. and i looked up into the sky to see the stars and i thought i noticed somthing strange. so put the dogs back in the house and at that time my 14 yr old daughter came inside and told me "the lights are back." (we have seen these lights before). so we went outside to see 6-10 glowing and blinking red lights in the sky. they started off in a straight line for aprox 1 min before scattering into diffrent directions at the same time. then we continued to observe them in the sky for aprox 45 mins. their movements seemed very random and irradict. some would hover slowly then shoot off at very high speeds, changing direction with out notice. while others would move slowly and then suddenly dissappear. this started around 10:25 pm and my husband and i watched them untill a little after 11 pm when we got tired and came inside. my daughter and her friend continued to watch foe another 20-30 mins at which point they came in. when they came inside the lights were still present in the sky.
content.summary: Multiple red lights in the sky at night. went diffrent directions at diffrent times. sometimes hivering and slowing down or speeding up.

content.detailedDescription:
At june 12 i started takin picture randomly from different point of views from my yard since june 11....And i took various pictures but i start taking out the ones that are obviously birds or planes but i kept the ones that i consider to be irregular like the ones i attached. when i took the pictures i didnt saw directly the objects since i was taking pictures randomly as i told you from different angles and zoom angles when i downloaded to my computer i saw this pictures to be irregular probably you can explin them or probably not.......Pic ufo7 clear and ufo11 clear are the most that im interested and pic ufo1 and ufo6 probably i took some real ufos without noticing it.

p.S. probably you can analyze this pics and decide if they are real or some explain can be given to them.

i took them with a digital camera lumix 4x that days were clear and i make sure that it wasnt birds or planes flying around....If they were i didnt take pictures only when i realize that it was clear to take one randonly, with different zoom angles.
content.summary: Hovering probably when i took the pics

content.detailedDescription: on my cb radio i had been hearing a high frequency pattern of sounds all day long so i thought it would be a great night to go out and investigate to see if we could see anything in the skies again so we got our dogs and went for a ride at around 2150hrs last night we got to the lake where we have seen things in the past, when we looked out over the lake and saw more strange lights in the distance above the tree tops, and hovering over the mountain. i then looked into the sky toward the southwest and saw an object traveling on a path toward our direction. i saw that it was not a commercial airplane because there was no beacon light on it. what caught my eye about it was the fact that i saw a bright burst of light in the sky and then saw it. there were so many different colors of light coming from it. we watched it come even closer to us and noticed that it was wavering in its path looking like it was rising and falling in its movement. the lights ranged from red to blue with no constant pattern that they blinked in. i saw that this object was being followed by what looked like a trail of light that was approximately 2 miles in length. about 10 minutes after watching it move across the sky we observed another object coming from the western part of the sky this object was low enough for me to see an outline and know that it was not man made aircraft, the object was at least 3 football fields in length and had lights that were in the shape of a chevron the colors all varied but were the same on the opposite side, you could not hear any sounds coming from it, only way to know that it was there is to have seen it moving in slowly toward us and then moving toward our local mountain. all this time that these things are taking place there was some lights hovering in different spots above the mountain and they did not move. i know that these lights are not supposed to be there because they were about 1000' above the mountains highest point. while this is happening my dogs are both shaking and growling at whatever this was. we all lost sight of the objects when the last one came to a very abrupt stop and vanished like it went behind a star. there was the chevron shaped one, one that was in the shape of a cigar that had 4 blue lights on it, the next was in the shape of a triangle that had purple and yellow lights coming from it, and the last object that vanished into thin air was a round shaped orb that was solid orange. i was feeling fine before all this happened when i woke up this morning i was not feeling well at all. i am not going to give this location to anyone unless they can prove to me who they are.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Out for our nightly ride with our dogs

content.detailedDescription: I went out back for a smoke and noticed this bright copper looking light in the sky. the light pulsated and then it disappeared. i was bummed out cause i didn't catch it on video. then as soon as i thought that, the copper light appeared hovering below the mountain then slowly move around and back up in the air. this time i grabbed my cell phone and got it on video. i am writing this shortly after capturing this ufo in hopes others may have seen the same thing. there is no cgi involved nor is this a hoax of any nature. i have the original left on my phone. phone is a samsung galaxy s 4g. shot on high definition.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo caught on camera hovering

content.detailedDescription:
A ufo appeared, and was changing  right before my eye���s. i had been outside looking at the stars. the sky was dark , clear of clouds, and the moon hadn���t risen yet .I came back into the house and sat in the recliner to watch television . i am looking at the tv right next to the full sliding screen door to the open porch 
directly in front of me. the view of the sky from where i am setting is jet black. 

suddenly a red circle appeared. it was large not small like a star . i���ve never seen anything like this in the sky.  the color was like a dark red ripe strawberry. as i ran out onto the porch it changed right in front  of my eye���s.  there was a orange red deep crescent thicker in the middle and tapering at each upward point . there were two perfect circles watermelon colored  above each point of the crescent. it was moving in a vertical position horizontally  across the sky. the size of the circles were like the size of a pencil eraser compared to a star ,and the depth of the crescent was at least  three times as long as the circle���s size. next there appears  a  frame of light yellow gold in the shape  of an elliptical with the circles midway of the yellow gold frame there appears to be cup like indentations on right and left top, outlined by the yellow gold frame. the frame appears to be equal in height above the circles as the orange red crescent is below. the size is now much larger now. there is nothing visible in the center.  

the object is slowly moving behind the treetops , the tree is approximately 40-50 feet tall. i can see light through the trees. the glimpses i can see it seems to have changed position . i can see it more horizontal to the ground with white in the center. at this point it definitely looks like a craft. it���s gone behind a taller tree and all i can see is light coming through the tree for a couple of seconds. then i see it again this time clearer. i see two  bright  white large rounded cylinder shaped protrusions in the center  with a deep red circle on either side. it is tilting toward me as it passes from behind the tree. it seems extremely close like two hundred feet or less , and its large. now it suddenly turned and i see four white rounded cylinder shapes sticking up from one side giving it a somewhat shape of a crown or tiara. at this point i realize that this object is not  making a sound !!!

i turned and ran as fast as i could into the house to get a camera and ran out the back door to the front yard , but by the time i got out there it was gone. i so much wish i would have just stayed there watching . at least i saw what i saw  and it was the most spectacular thing i���ve ever seen in the sky.

this all took place 30 seconds or less , with the object only being clearly visible  for 5-10 seconds. the object first appeared in the southern sky moving in a northeastern direction. it was visible to me in the area of the old beloit hospital off olympian blvd. beloit ,wisconsin. 10:45 pm friday june 8-2012tt
content.summary: Dark red circle appears, suddenly changing shape, flashing light, no sound

content.detailedDescription:
My wife was dropping me off at work when we both noticed a bright shiny object against the blue cloudless sky immediately after driving out of a bend in the road. the sighting was of what appeared to be a disk shaped object viewed from the side. the object was reflecting sunlight equally across its surface that looked to be shiny and metallic. its was wobbling on its axis which caused the sunlight reflecting on it to glint. the thing, as if knowing we had spotted it then either took off at a high rate of speed in exactly the opposite of our line of sight, or imploded/faded in on itself and disappeared! its size was that of an advil pill held at arms length at 25 degrees straight ahead on our right as we were driving east on u.S. 36 about 7 miles from urbana ohio. duration of the sighting was around 10 seconds. i thought at first that it was some kind of metallic kite or balloon. after concluding that what we witnessed was inexplicable our feelings were that of elation for having witnessed something so incredible!

someone else had to have seen it besides us a traffic was heavy at that time and the way it was reflecting light against the blue sky made it impossible to ignore.

no pictures, sighting was too short.

this craft was something real and not a refection on our windscreen. i got a pretty darn good look at it and it was a disc!!!
content.summary: Disc was wobbling and reflecting sunlight before fading out.

content.detailedDescription:
My sons saw the object first while outside smoking a cigarette on the deck and called me out to see it, and observed no sound coming from object, quickly grabbed the digital camera, tried to take a picture, and the camera wouldn't show the image on it. took another and another as the object moved away, picking up some speed. downloaded the pictures onto the desktop and found only one picture came out clear enough to see (a cigar shaped object)

when you first look at the dark night sky, you don't see anything. but scroll into the picture making it larger and it looks like a bright white cigar object.
content.summary: Slow moving object, no sound, moving in a southern direction, sons saw the object first.
Ultra bright light ,changed direction and increased speed

content.detailedDescription: On 6/15/2012 i was sleeping over the terrace.. around 8.40pm a boomerang shaped object passed in a high speed.. it was grey in color.. no sound. no lights. it lost in the sky...
content.summary: Its like a boomerang fly over me.. i was sleeping in the terrace and it was passing below the clouds. no sound.. nothing.. it passed silently

content.detailedDescription:
On 6-14-2012 at about 9:50 pm-while driving north from adrian michigan to tipton, mi.  small thin clouds were present in the sky as we drove. my wife and i both saw a bright blue/green streak of light in the nne sky at about a 45 degree angle above the horizon. the streak followed a round object with a notable ring surrounding the object (much like the ring or aura surrounding the moon on a cloudy night).  while driving, a tree crossed between us and the object.  upon passing the tree the object had disappeared.  all of this occurred while my wife was speaking to her mother on the phone.

attached is a simplified rendering of what we saw.
content.summary: Seen in nne sky. large bright blue/green streak. decending in >30 degree angle.

content.detailedDescription:
On monday, october 17th, 2011 at approximately 7:45pm, i was traveling with my spouse on i-355 southwest towards new lenox. we were roughly four miles from the us 6 southwest highway exit when i noticed a small, extremely bright silver and amber hued light flare violently in the southeastern sky. after momentarily intensifying, it began to soundlessly plummet towards the earth at a 75-degree angle.

the light, which at first resembled a pulsating silver and amber flame, was falling so rapidly i estimated it would collide with the terrain just a few hundred feet from our car in seconds. unconsciously bracing myself for impact, i was startled when it began to decelerate, releasing four amber-hued jets or streams of what appeared to be flaming gas as it declined to an altitude of 200 feet.

after a moment of intense anxiety, i was able to discern that the light concealed a dark object, roughly disc-shaped and tilted at a 45-dgree angle so that the amber jets appeared to be issuing from its underside. 

as soon as i was able, i drew my spouse's attention to the disc and she began to reduce her speed to between 5-7 miles an hour. the disc was roughly 200 feet from us at this time and we were gradually approaching it from the northeast.

there was virtually no traffic on i-355 at that time and i was becoming increasingly concerned that we were alone, vulnerable and potentially in danger. i felt the onset of panic but tried to remain calm. 

the amber jets issuing from the disc cut off abruptly and were replaced by a vaporous fog which enshrouded it as it as it hung suspended in midair roughly fifty feet from the ground. 

the disc had become a black silhouette which did not move or sway in the wind. the fog quickly began to dissipate and the disc tilted from 45-degrees to 180-degrees and began to glide very slowly across the shoulder of the road and into the oncoming lane as if on an invisible track. 

as it approached it began to descend at a 45-degree angle, but did not change its axis. the descent was surreally smooth. the object did not waver or rock in the wind. when the disc had descended to about 30 feet, i suddenly felt an unaccountable feeling of calm come over me. as it neared the well-lit median, a small teal (the color is still difficult for me to describe - this is approximate) light or beacon slowly appeared under its outer lip or rim. the process of illumination reminded me of the irregular flickering of a fluorescent bulb when first switched on.

the light emanated from an object that superficially resembled an ornate cylinder lamp or lantern hanging from the underside of the disc's outer rim. it also seemed as though portions of the disc had suddenly become internally illuminated by the same unusual teal light, giving the impression of an detailed inner framework and a large window-like area.


as the object continued its descent it passed between two median streetlights and paused directly in front of our car. we had slowed almost to a halt at this juncture and the object proceeded to slowly move directly in front of our vehicle. i was now able to confirm with certainty that the object was disc shaped (although observing it from its side caused it to momentarily appear football-shaped). it was roughly 30 feet in length and perhaps 9-12 feet in in height. it emitted no sound whatsoever. its surface was metallic and highly refractive like an intensely polished mirror. its undercarriage appeared to be corrugated in the light of the teal lamp. 

the object kept an even 30 foot distance from our car at all times, moving silently forward as we approached it while remaining directly in front of us at all times. again, it did not rock or sway in the wind.

the disc remained in front of us in this manner for about 20-40 seconds, then slowly moved west to the shoulder of the road where it continued to follow us from an approximate 30 foot elevation and 30 foot distance for another 20-30 seconds. it then proceeded into the darkness over an adjoining field. as it moved out of the street lamp's illumination, the disc���s internal lighting dampened and gradually went out - leaving only the glowing of teal lamp to identify it.

when it had passed completely into the darkness the disc became almost totally camouflaged, except for the teal light, which had become faint and ghostly. my spouse and i strained to observe the object as it begin to climb in elevation and pass over the (then) unfinished structure of the silver cross hospital near the us 6 southwest highway exit. 

as we traveled towards our home, i was able to observe the object by following the small teal lamp. i was also occasionally able to see the entire disc as the ambient light beneath it caused it to become visible. the object remained visible in the night sky for a distance of about 5 miles and a span of about 5-6 minutes before it vanished moving towards the southwest.

since this occurrence, i have contacted nuforc (just a short time after the event) - the investigator suggested that i may have seen the direct tv blimp. this seems unlikely because the object did not resemble the blimp in question, or any other blimp i have ever seen for that matter. moreover, i would be astonished if any dirigible could maneuver in the manner we witnessed. flying an unlit blimp just 30 feet above a major highway (between median streetlamps!), residential area and at least two airfields is not only extremely dangerous but against the law and highly improbable.   

i contacted the faa on the afternoon of the 18th but they told me bluntly that they couldn't account for the object (i mentioned it might have been a blimp). i was also surprised to discover that the faa apparently does not track everything in their jurisdiction and that private aircraft could be flown and landed in virtually any private field without radio contact or illumination!

when it became apparent to the agent that i was trying to report an unconventional aircraft sighting, i was referred without further comment to the private company, bigelow aerospace corporation. not wanting to waste any further effort i simply gave up.

i am writing this report with considerable reservation. there are other aspects of my experience which i am not comfortable disclosing in a public forum. this experience has severely troubled me since october last year. its implications are enormous and have had adversely impacted my life, health and worldview.

i am submitting this because recent circumstances have caused me to reflect further on the possible implications of this shared experience and because, frankly, i really don���t know how else to deal with this.

it is my hope that a responsible member of the mufon organization with experience, sensitivity and demonstrable qualifications might assist me in finding a way to better understand what i experienced and why.

for this purpose, i may be reached at the email address included with this report.

i would greatly appreciate any assistance, explanation or corroboration which might be offered. my thanks in advance.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two witnesses watch 30ft disc fall from high altitude in seconds, change axis, stop 30ft over highway, pass slowly and silently between median streetlamps and interact with vehicle in close proximity

content.detailedDescription: I was eating my superbatoial ice cream next to my office. i heard a loud whir. i saw a green and blue light. my younger nephew saw it too from his toy pen. i heard him scream in amazment. i couldnt believe my eyes.  i was astonoshed. ive seen those ufo shows but i was very sceptical by the evidence given. i was scared. creatures fall from the object. they dissolved into mid air as they decended again and continued to repeat the motion. i almost called the police but knew they would not believe my story. i took pictures and sent them to my uncle who was a scientist at west michigan university years back. he told me it was all a joke and to just give it up. well i didnt. i called local news and they had said they have not heard of any other sightings. have i gone mad? when i was watching the creatures fall i realized this was no joke but it just dissapeared so when i brought the evidence to my uncle i had nothing to prove the situation. i decided to eat bullshit because thats all this story is. xoxoxo- jerry ������
content.summary: Stuff you would think would onlky be observed in specipical films but now ar more ukiloranity than ever.

content.detailedDescription: I, my sister-in-law, mother-in-law, and young toddler where walking around in the front yard when i saw two shiny objects flying slowly back and forth over the nearby mountain around 7:30 p.M.....They caught my eye because the sun was reflecting on them so well and i didn't believe them to be planes or jets.  i thought one looked alot like an airship/blimp.  my baby and i walked to the backyard to play and i noticed the objects again.  we went inside to get binoculars...She is 20 months old and actually pointed at the objects.  i also alerted my husband who saw them as well.  he shrugged them off as airplanes of course and went back inside. a 3rd one appeared moments later that looked different.  through the binoculars i realized the sun was making the objects shiny. several minutes later i observed that the sun wasn't shining on them anymore.....One was black, red and plane-like and one was silver and cigar-shaped but the other would not come close enough to observe. the 3 objects flew very slow back and forth for about 30 minutes the black one flew slowly off towards virginia.  the silver one and the unknown one flew several times around the mountain area and one even disappeared before my eyes.  then they were gone.  i waited for 5 more minutes and then i just went inside, afraid.  i heard no noise whatsoever the whole time i was observing.  there were no vapor trails but it did appear there was heat around the objects.  they were moving slower than most planes fly around this area.  we see many planes and different kind of planes go over everyday...But today was different.  i have never seen anyhting like this.  absolutely awesome and distubing at the same time.  i am no longer a skeptic and i do not feel safe.  planes or ufo's - something didn't feel right.
content.summary: 3 objects - plane-like, flying back and forth over hanging rock mountain
